scripts.dev:functions: bash -lc 'source ./scripts/load-env.sh development && cd functions && bun run build && firebase emulators:exec --only functions "bun run dev"'
scripts.dev:search: bash -lc 'source ./scripts/load-env.sh development && cd services/search && PROFILE=dev uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9100'
scripts.dev:brightdata: bash -lc 'source ./scripts/load-env.sh development && cd services/brightdata && PROFILE=dev uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9101'
scripts.dev:viewer: bash -lc 'source ./scripts/load-env.sh development && cd services/viewer && PROFILE=dev streamlit run app.py --server.port 9102'
scripts.dev: bash -lc 'source ./scripts/load-env.sh development && concurrently -n EMU,SRCH,BD,VIEW -c yellow,green,blue,cyan "npm run dev:emulators" "npm run dev:search" "npm run dev:brightdata" "npm run dev:viewer"'
scripts.test: PROFILE=test bun run test:search && bun run test:brightdata
